carpet.rule.xpbeacons.desc: if true uses experience-based amplitude on beacon status effects. See xp.fracturedcode.net
xpbeacons.rule.beacon_duration_multiplie: effect duration in ticks= (9 + beacon level * beacon_duration_multiplier) * 20 according to the vanilla behavior
define the max pyramid level that affects the beacon. Use responsibly; a large pyramid could really start to lag things
xpbeacons.rule.beacon_reach_multiplier.d: (beacon_reach_multiplier * beacon level) + 10 = reach in meters according to the vanilla behavior
xpbeacons.rule.beacon_tick_rate.desc: set beacon tick rate in game ticks per beacon tick
xpbeacons.rule.haste_amplitude_ceiling.d: effect amplitude ceiling for haste. default maybe a bit OP, play around with this one; mining obsidian is like mining stone without enchants or haste
toggle xp beacons for haste effect
xpbeacons.rule.haste_xp_ceiling.desc: xp ceiling in levels for haste
xpbeacons.rule.haste_xp_drain.desc: xp drain feature toggle for haste
xpbeacons.rule.haste_xp_drain_rate.desc: xp drain rate for haste. each beacon tick takes away (haste_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
xpbeacons.rule.jump_boost_amplitude_ceil: effect amplitude ceiling for jump boost
xpbeacons.rule.jump_boost_xp_based_ampli: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect
xpbeacons.rule.jump_boost_xp_ceiling.des: xp ceiling in levels for jump boost
xpbeacons.rule.jump_boost_xp_drain.desc: xp drain feature toggle for jump boost
xp drain rate for jump boost. each beacon tick takes away (jump_boost_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
xpbeacons.rule.regeneration_amplitude_ce: effect amplitude ceiling for resistance. default 5 is pretty fast, but if you have the default 8000 levels, is it really OP?
xpbeacons.rule.regeneration_xp_based_amp: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect
xpbeacons.rule.regeneration_xp_ceiling.d: xp ceiling in levels for resistance
xpbeacons.rule.regeneration_xp_drain.des: xp drain feature toggle for regeneration
xpbeacons.rule.regeneration_xp_drain_rat: xp drain rate for regeneration. each beacon tick takes away (resistance_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
xpbeacons.rule.resistance_amplitude_ceil: effect amplitude ceiling for resistance. with default of 3 you can survive 100m drop no armor on half heart. 200m drop with enchanted armor easily
xpbeacons.rule.resistance_xp_based_ampli: toggle xp beacons for resistance effect
xpbeacons.rule.resistance_xp_ceiling.des: xp ceiling in levels for resistance
xpbeacons.rule.resistance_xp_drain.desc: xp drain feature toggle for resistance
xp drain rate for resistance. each beacon tick takes away (resistance_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
xpbeacons.rule.speed_amplitude_ceiling.d: effect amplitude ceiling for speed. default speed 6, about as fast as I'd want to go
toggle xp beacons for speed effect
xpbeacons.rule.speed_xp_ceiling.desc: xp ceiling in levels for speed
xpbeacons.rule.speed_xp_drain.desc: xp drain feature toggle for speed
xpbeacons.rule.speed_xp_drain_rate.desc: xp drain rate for haste. each beacon tick takes away (speed_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
xpbeacons.rule.strength_amplitude_ceilin: effect amplitude ceiling for strength. one hit a zombie with your fists in this default.
xpbeacons.rule.strength_xp_based_amplitu: toggle xp beacons for strength effect
xpbeacons.rule.strength_xp_ceiling.desc: xp ceiling in levels for strength
xpbeacons.rule.strength_xp_drain.desc: xp drain feature toggle for strength
xpbeacons.rule.strength_xp_drain_rate.de: xp drain rate for strength. each beacon tick takes away (strength_xp_drain_rate * effect amplifier) xp POINTS
